article_title: Lawmakers raise more doubts about NASA’s plans to go to Mars
article_text:
Lawmakers raise more doubts about NASA’s plans to go to Mars

Photo: Juanito M Garza, Staff U.S. Rep. Lamar Smith meeting with SAEN Editorial Board for a wide...

Lawmakers on Thursday again questioned President Barack Obama's commitment to sending humans to Mars as they begin hashing out NASA's $19 billion budget proposal for fiscal year 2017, a plan some said does little to pave the way to the red planet.
